docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• docker version - All information about docker.
  • docker info - All information about docker status.
  • docker --version - Only the version.
  • docker --help - Fast help.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Welcome to the Docker Containers project! This guide will help you get started with setting up and running the project.

docs.title: Project Structure
docs.text:
Here's an overview of the project structure:

/Users/frgonzal/Documents/vit/docker-containers/
├── docker-compose.yml
├── Dockerfile
├── docs/
│   └── getting-started.md
├── src/
│   ├── app/
│   └── config/
└── README.md

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text: Before you begin, ensure you have the following installed: - Docker - Docker Compose

docs.title: Setup
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository: 

    git clone https://github.com/yourusername/docker-containers.git
cd docker-containers

  2. Build the Docker image: 

    docker-compose build

  3. Run the Docker containers: 

    docker-compose up

docs.title: Accessing the Application
docs.text: Once the containers are up and running, you can access the application at http://localhost:your_port.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.text: For more detailed information, refer to the documentation.

docs.title: Troubleshooting
docs.text:
If you encounter any issues, check the logs using: 

docker-compose logs

Feel free to reach out for support if you need further assistance.

Happy coding!
